page.title: 17BURWELL PAPERS AND MAGAZINE.
page.content: Our local papers are{The Cambridge {Evening News}(daily) and{The Newmarket {Journal}(weekly).Some stories that have also hit the{national headlines concerned{sextuplets}born to a Burwell mother,a young{Olympic hurdle hopeful, a Burwell{coach driver}whose skill {saved many lives}in a crash.A local item included a young man chosen to go exploring with{Operation Raleigh. {Newspaper boys and girls}deliver from 2 news agents and the barber's shop. There are{free weekly papers}made up mostly of advertisements.They include The Town Crier,The Newmarket Weekly, and The Mid-Week. {Clunch}is the{community magazine.}It was the{Vicar's idea 10 years ago.}A copy goes free to each house in Burwell though it costs 32p for every one of{1800 copies.}It gets its{name {from the local building material.
